newsitem.title: USA: Golden Eagle says to merge with Columbia.
newsitem.headline: Golden Eagle says to merge with Columbia.

text.p: Golden Eagle Group Inc said on Monday it signed a letter of intent for a merger with Columbia Shipping Group, a New York-based, privately held freight forwarder.
Golden Eagle said in a press release that the terms of the agreement include a combination of stock, cash through bank financing and seller financing.

The company said the acquisition is subject to various conditions including the negotiation of a mutually acceptable stock purchase agreement, the receipt of all required third party consents, the approval of the both companies' boards of directors and the completion of a final audit.
Golden Eagle is Houston-based, international ocean and air freight forwarding company.
